name: Cube Quest (Clive dev)
description:
You play as a cube that's just having a normal day but finds out about this treasure so he goes looking for the treasure.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme It is not real

Credits

Developed by Clive

Music by lukefitz

Tools Used

Unity

Kenney  & Freesound.org sound effects

Milkshake Camera Shake (Unity Assets Store)

Photopea
